Question
========

In an examination of the correlation between reaction times to a simple task (*y*) and IQ (*x*) found a correlation of *r* = 0.60. This can be interpreted as

Answerlist
----------

* A 60% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.
* A 36% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.
* That for 60% of all y, prediction (ŷ) = y.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A 60% decrease in errors from predicting y with x.: Incorrect
* A 36% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.: Correct
* That for 60% of all y, prediction (ŷ) = y.: Incorrect
